text: Veep will return for its seventh and final season in spring 2019. HBO president of programming Casey Bloys made the announcement at TCA. “ Writers are now getting together, with shooting scheduled to begin this fall, and the final Season 7 airing sometime this spring, ” he said. HBO announced last September that Season 7 would be the last for the multi - Emmy - winning series. The production schedule was pushed due to star Julia Louis - Dreyfus ’ cancer surgery and treatment. Louis - Dreyfus disclosed her diagnosis last September and posted frequent updates on her progress on social media.
